wikipedia_page.main: Henry Potts (1810 – 22 March 1884) was an English farmer, steeplechase rider, High Sheriff of Flintshire and Denbighshire, and cricketer with amateur status who was active in 1831. He was born and died in Chester.

response: * The Duke, the 8-year-old winner of the 1836 Great Liverpool Steeplechase, ridden by Henry Potts
